title: Looking for some people willing to bear with me or help as I get the hang of PvP
body: Still pretty new and not so great at this game, so some people who don't mind putting up with that or even willing to help and give me a few pointers would be awesome, thank you.

replies.body: I'm not 100% sure what you mean, but if you're asking why I said bear, bear with me means like tolerate or put up with me.
yeah we know, but the correct spelling is bare..
No, bare with me would be a request to get undressed as bare means not clothed or covered.
this is true my mistake, but i think bare sounds better ;)

im really bare right now,
but srsly ill play with ya
